name: Web Paint
description: A UI5 app which uses FabricJS to allow the user to draw by drag-and-dropping shapes and import external pictures. The user can also resize, move and change the colors of the shapes, use undo-redo functionality, save or load drawing files and also to export to PNG.

images.description: The main drawing area of the application, with the shape palette on the top and the objects' properties on the left.
